name: Logout off the site succesfully
statusMessage: An unknown exception was encountered sending an HTTP request to the remote WebDriver server for URL http://localhost:4444/session. The exception message was: An error occurred while sending the request. -> An error occurred while sending the request. -> Unable to read data from the transport connection: Connection reset by peer. -> Connection reset by peer
